00047                      uint64_t cnt, int align, int reverse);

00049                        int elements[]);

00051 extern int  cvmx_range_free_with_base(uint64_t range_addr, int base, int cnt);
00052 extern int  cvmx_range_free_with_owner(uint64_t range_addr, uint64_t owner);
00053 extern uint64_t cvmx_range_get_owner(uint64_t range_addr, uint64_t base);
